chivote.description: We introduced and implemented CHI.VOTE, the core product of the Chi.Vote Collective, a new group of nonpartisan media and civic organizations that believe in fostering a safer, more prosperous and more equitable and connected Chicago by creating content and tools of the highest quality and accessibility around city elections.
chivote.links: Read what others had to say about Chi.Vote here, here, and here.

confirmation.message:
Thank you for your interest in Electoraid. Elections are the lifeblood of American democracy and we know how much newsrooms pour into their election resources. We’re excited that you want to make the most of this next election.

We’re excited to talk more with you soon. Have any pressing inquiries? Feel free to reach out to our product manager Olivia Obineme at oobineme@chicagoreporter.com!

footer.description: Founded on the heels of the civil rights movement of the 1960s, The Chicago Reporter confronts racial and economic inequality, using the power of investigative journalism.
